text: Fabrice Santoro was the defending champion, but chose not to compete this year. Dustin Brown won in the final 7–6(7–2), 6–3 against Izak van der Merwe. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Singles Soweto Open - Singles 2010 Men's Singles
title: 2010 Soweto Open – Singles
